body: Because Better Sprinting Mod is being annoying and I can't get it to work and not crash my game, am I allowed to make an injectable client that checks when I'm sprinting, and makes me sprint, or does this count as hacking? In theory, it's doing the same thing as BSM, so it should be fine.
body_tagged: Because Better Sprinting Mod is being annoying and I can't get it to work and not crash my game, am I allowed to make an injectable client that checks when I'm sprinting, and makes me sprint, or does this count as hacking? In theory, it's doing the same thing as BSM, so it should be fine.
title: Another question about the rules

replies.body: Posighdun allowed me, and I've test it all, and it works 100% like vanilla MC.
replies.body_tagged: Posighdun allowed me, and I've test it all, and it works 100% like vanilla MC.
